title: Cant purchase the 5 augment Cache deal

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: So every time I try to purchase the 5 augment cache, this message pops up. I can purchase anything else but not this for some reason. I've tried restarting my client and also waiting a couple hours but yet Im unable to purchase the deal. Please help, I really want to start gambling with my luck.

replies.body: yeh the 5 one is broken. but you can buy bother the 10 packs, and a few lone ones to reach your "daily cap"
